A

AbstractConnectionDelegate - Class in com.poesys.bs.delegate
An abstract base class for the business delegates in the application that require a database connection and managed transactions.
AbstractConnectionDelegate(String, IConnectionFactory.DBMS) - Constructor for class com.poesys.bs.delegate.AbstractConnectionDelegate
Standard constructor that sets the name of the subsystem and the database type for construction of connections to the database.
AbstractConnectionDelegate(String) - Constructor for class com.poesys.bs.delegate.AbstractConnectionDelegate
Create a connection delegate by getting the target DBMS and password from the properties file for the subsystem.

An abstract base class that implements the IDataDelegate interface for the JDBC-based business delegates in the application that require a JDBC database connection and DAOs.

An abstract subclass of the AbstractDataDelegate for the JDBC-based business delegates in the application that require a JDBC database connection and managed transactions and that also have an identity or auto-generated primary key.
